Package oracle.adf.view.rich.component.rich.nav

Class Summary
RichActiveCommandToolbarButton
RichBreadCrumbs A breadCrumbs component is used in hierarchical site layouts to indicate the path back to the root page of the hierarchy with links.
RichCommandButton The commandButton component creates a button that, when pressed, will generate an action event on the server.
RichCommandImageLink <html:p> The commandImageLink component creates a link that has icon support, when pressed, will generate an action event on the server.
RichCommandLink <html:p> The commandLink component creates a link that, when pressed, will generate an action event on the server.
RichCommandMenuItem The commandMenuItem creates an item in a menu.
RichCommandNavigationItem <html:p> The commandNavigationItem control creates a navigation item representation of a UIXCommand.
RichCommandToolbarButton
RichGoButton The goButton creates a push button that navigates directly to another location instead of delivering an action.
RichGoImageLink <html:p> The goImageLink component renders a HTML link with an icon support, that navigates directly to another location instead of delivering an action.
RichGoLink <html:p> The goLink component renders a HTML link, that navigates directly to another location instead of delivering an action.
RichGoMenuItem <html:p> The goMenuItem component is a menu item that renders an HTML link.
RichNavigationPane <html:p> The navigationPane component creates a series of navigation items representing one level in a navigation hierarchy.
RichResetButton The reset button control creates a push button which will reset the content of a form for all input and select components.
RichTrain The train component presents a user with a series of stops, each stop representing a step in a multi-step process.
RichTrainButtonBar The trainButtonBar component includes two buttons that provide an additional means to navigate a multi-step process.
